p: These results indicate the superior cytotoxic activity of the N-unsubstituted isatin derivatives 5a-g on both breast cancer cell lines with IC 50 range of 2.27–12.93 µM and 1.27–9.67 µM on MCF-7 and T-47D cell lines, respectively, which could be due to their better binding to the target kinases. Compounds 5d–f with Br, CH 3 and OCH 3 substituent on the isatin nucleus, respectively, showed the best cytotoxic activity ( Table 1).
